value.title: Control Azure spending and manage bills with Azure Cost Management + Billing
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and control your Azure spending and optimize the use of Azure resources.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

topItems.title: Analyze costs and create budgets with Azure Cost Management
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use cost analysis to understand how your costs accrue each month.

topItems.title: Save money with Azure Reserved Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use plan for, buy, and manage Azure reservations to save money.

value.title: Deploy a website to Azure with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, get acquainted with using Azure App Service to create and deploy your website without underlying servers, storage or network assets.

topItems.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

topItems.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

topItems.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
topItems.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Introduce DevOps Dojo: Create efficiencies that support your business
value.excerpt: Start your DevOps Dojo journey.  Create multidisciplinary DevOps teams by using shared tools and processes that are designed to make your organizationâ€™s software development and implementation projects more efficient.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
topItems.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

topItems.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.title: Monitor and back up resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and back up Azure resources.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure cognitive vision services
value.excerpt: Process and classify images with the Azure cognitive vision services

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Computer Vision API in Azure to identify facial details in pictures

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Cognitive Vision Services detects faces, tags and classifies images, and identifies objects.

topItems.title: Extract insights from videos with the Video Indexer service
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Video Indexer API to upload, index, retrieve insights, and search for content in video files.

value.title: Process natural language with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Process natural language with Azure Cognitive Language Services

topItems.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

topItems.title: Manage your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
topItems.excerpt: Learn to manage LUIS apps through versioning, key management, handling data, and improving predictions.

topItems.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
topItems.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Work with relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: This learning path introduces you to Azure-supported SQL-based enterprise data solutions enabling you to store and retrieve your app's data in the cloud.

topItems.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
topItems.excerpt: Find out what makes Azure SQL Database a good choice for your relational database, how to create the database from the portal and connect with Azure Cloud Shell.

topItems.title: Migrate your relational data stored in SQL Server to Azure SQL Database
topItems.excerpt: Plan and implement the migration of relational data from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. Select the appropriate migration strategy for your database, and then use Data Migration Assistant to do the assessment and the migration.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Database for PostgreSQL
topItems.excerpt: This module is a no-code introduction to PostgreSQL on Azure, including an explanation of particular problems that using Azure Database for PostgreSQL can solve. At a high level, we show how the components fit together and identify situations where you should use Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

topItems.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

topItems.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Deliver remote desktops and apps from Azure with Windows Virtual Desktop
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop on Microsoft Azure is a desktop and app virtualization service that runs on the cloud. Windows Virtual Desktop works across devices â€“ including Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android â€“ with full-featured apps that you can use to access remote desktops and apps.

topItems.title: Introduction to Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Windows Virtual Desktop to deliver remote desktop and remote app experiences in Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Prepare for Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to prepare for Windows Virtual Desktop - a cloud-based virtualization solution running on Microsoft Azure. Windows Virtual Desktop is an elastically scalable service to deliver remote desktop and remote app experiences - without having to manage the underlying server infrastructure. Review the prerequisites and tools provided by Microsoft get ready to provision your first Windows Virtual Desktop host pool.

topItems.title: Deploy Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Windows Virtual Desktop and customize the workspace for your users.

topItems.title: Optimize Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn the steps to optimize Windows Virtual Desktop, including how to take advantage of new storage, file management, and automated scaling options.

topItems.title: Enabling digital transformation
topItems.excerpt: Digital transformation is a wave of business innovation fueled by the explosion of technologyâ€”data, applications, and devices are everywhere. The cloud, artificial intelligence (AI), and the internet of things (IoT) give organizations new ways to make sense of information and generate insights to transform their business. Realizing the benefits of digital transformation requires business leaders to look beyond technology to reimagine existing business models and embrace a different way of bringing together people, data, and processes to create value for customers.

value.title: Develop IoT solutions with Azure IoT Central
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
topItems.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

topItems.title: Set up rules and take action on telemetry data in Azure IoT Central
topItems.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. We build the IoT Central app from a downloaded JSON file, defining all the device capabilities. Source code is also downloaded for the device app. The focus of this module is on creating rules and actions, to respond to certain telemetry input. Rules and actions enable greater automation of an IoT Central system.

topItems.title: Manage IoT Central applications with the REST API
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to manage an IoT Central application programmatically using the REST API

topItems.title: Set up continuous data export from Azure IoT Central to a Power BI app
topItems.excerpt: This module covers continuous data export from IoT Central. You use the scenario from your previously completed "Create your first Azure IoT Central app" Learn module, where you controlled a refrigerated truck. Here, in this module, you add continuous data export to both Azure Blob storage and an event hub. You then build a Power BI app to read and display the telemetry data on a mobile phone.

value.title: Learn the business value of Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Are you interested in learning about the cloud in an easy to understand way? Or perhaps you are confused about where to begin with cloud technology? This learning path introduces you to digital transformation, what Azure is, and all the different ways it can meet your business needs.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure solutions
topItems.excerpt: Get started with your digital transformation by exploring why now is the right time to begin, why Azure is the right platform, and how Azure can bring overall value to your organization. We'll demonstrate key scenarios that illustrate how digital transformation with Azure can empower employees, engage customers, optimize operations, and transform products.

topItems.title: Applications and infrastructure migration and modernization
topItems.excerpt: Every modern business is powered by applications, such as internal procurement applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, retail websites, and third-party products. As your business prepares for digital transformation, itâ€™s important to begin modernizing and migrating your applications and infrastructure to the cloud. Azure is a key component of that process. You can choose to migrate, modernize, or build cloud native solutions depending on your business goals and how you assess your application portfolio. This is a strategic decision. Youâ€™ll be able to choose the path thatâ€™s right for your organization.

topItems.title: Microsoft data estate migration and modernization
topItems.excerpt: Establishing a modern data estate is a foundational step toward digital transformation. A modern data estate enables timely insights and decision making across all your data, and sets the foundation for AI. A data estate is all of the data an organization owns. When you migrate this data to the cloud or modernize your environment on-premises you can gain important insights to fuel innovation.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
topItems.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Virtualization - Sharing cloud resources
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Dive deeper into how the cloud works by understanding virtualization. How are computing power, memory, input and output, networking, and storage virtualized?

topItems.title: Share cloud resources
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Get an introduction to virtualization, one of the many technologies that power the cloud. Learn what virtualization is, its benefits, and how cloud resources are shared.

topItems.title: Understand virtualization
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

topItems.title: Virtualize computing power
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn about how computing power is virtualized using virtual CPUs. Covers different types of CPU virtualization.

topItems.title: Virtualize memory
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn how memory is virtualized to support cloud resources. Covers different types of memory mapping and related issues.

value.title: Accelerate cloud adoption with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
value.excerpt: Do you need a clear path forward for your cloud journey? This learning path includes best practice guidance to help you create a cloud strategy, define a cloud adoption plan, prepare your cloud environment with proper governance, and implement cloud operations in alignment with your organizational needs.  Cloud architects and IT professionals will learn and engage with the proven best practices, tools, and documentation in the Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure to build the technical knowledge needed to help your organization successfully adopt the cloud and meet business goals.

topItems.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
topItems.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organizationâ€™s cloud adoption efforts

topItems.title: Prepare for successful cloud adoption with a well-defined strategy
topItems.excerpt: Success in cloud adoption is predicated by a clear strategy that helps the team understand executive direction and regularly measure progress. This module will help capture the cloud adoption strategy needed to drive your success.

topItems.title: CAF Plan: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data-driven plan.
topItems.excerpt: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data driven, cloud adoption plan from CAF. For new innovations, learn from others who have used the target platforms. For migrations, understand how to evaluate your assets and plan the efforts required to move them to the cloud.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure landing zone to support your cloud operations requirements
topItems.excerpt: Azure landing zones help accelerate configuration of your environment to meet your operational requirements.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, use cases, and special factors of an enterprise AI strategy that creates real business value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
topItems.excerpt: Explore the strategic components, special factors, and use cases of an AI strategy in education that creates value, with INSEAD and Microsoft.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.
